thread.title: Trump's New 'I'm Rubber And YOU'RE Working The Russians' Strategy Is NOT Working! (Nor Is Spell Check…)
thread.title_full: Trump's New 'I'm Rubber And YOU'RE Working With The Russians' Strategy Is NOT Working! (Nor Is His Spell Check…) | PerezHilton.com

author: perezhilton
title: Trump's New 'I'm Rubber And YOU'RE Working The Russians' Strategy Is NOT Working! (Nor Is Spell Check…)
text:
Once again, Donald Trump is trying to turn this whole Russia thing around… and once again, he's failing miserably.
Just as he did previously with Democratic Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer , he is demanding (on Twitter , because that's how being President works) that House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi be investigated for HER ties to Russia.
This is of course in response to the Democratic calls for investigation into the growing number of Trump team members who secretly met with Russian government officials during the campaign then lied about it .
Related: Mike Pence Used A Private Email Account As Governor Of Indiana! 
In Schumer's case, Trump's "smoking gun" was a photo taken by the press at a large political event — a matter of public record Schumer laughed off.
For Pelosi, Trump has something more substantial the exact same, as he tweeted: 
I hereby demand a second investigation, after Schumer, of Pelosi for her close ties to Russia, and lying about it. https://t.co/qCDljfF3wN 
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) March 3, 2017 

Pelosi, who has called for Attorney General Jeff Sessions ' resignation after it was made clear he lied under oath, quickly responded:
. @realDonaldTrump doesn't know difference between official mtg photographed by press & closed secret mtg his AG lied about under oath. https://t.co/YRFCuJkjLA 
— Nancy Pelosi (@NancyPelosi) March 3, 2017 

Yeah, not sure where Trump is getting the idea that Pelosi lied about whether she had a meeting in which a member of the Russian government was in attendance.
Related: Trump Drops That Whole 'Sounding Presidential' Thing To Defend Jeff Sessions 
Is POTUS really that clueless?
Or does he know this will be enough misdirection for the people he was able to fool into voting for him?
Obviously he's got good brain. Why, it only took him THREE attempts to correctly spell the word "hereby" — take a look:
When Betsey Devos is Secretary Of Education. pic.twitter.com/1ZoZufB3Qw 
— Matthew A. Cherry (@MatthewACherry) March 3, 2017 

And yes, those deleted tweets are 100% real; you can verify HERE !
[ Image via CNN /FayesVision/ WENN . ] 
Tags: donald trump , nancy pelosi , politik , russia , twitter
